title: Krypta ve stokách
content:
Krypta ve stokách is (as the name quite obviously suggests) a crypt in the Wyzimské stoky which is behind a locked gate. Geralt is given the key to these gates by the rascal who hangs out by the sewer entrance every morning between 06:00 and 09:00.

Inside is a fairly standard crypt, guarded graveirs and ghúls, about a half dozen of each. There is also a nicely stocked chest in the deepest, darkest chamber, along with a ohniště and a corpse.
